name: Coinhaven team library
description: Coinhaven is an all-in-one trading and exchange platform where you can easily buy Bitcoin and other crypto assets with a variety of fiat currencies (USD, EUR, GBP, AUD, NGN, KES, GHC, MZN, ZAR). You can also exchange your Bitcoin for other crypto assets - such as Ethereum - with just a few clicks.
